question: How is Canada ranked in terms of geographical size in the world?
possible_answers: A. It is the largest country on Earth.
B. It is the second-largest country on Earth.
C. It is the third-largest country on Earth.
D. It is the seventh largest country on Earth.
main_question: How is Canada ranked in terms of geographical size in the world?
answer: B. It is the second-largest country on Earth.
explanatory_sentence: Canada is the second largest country on earth - 10 million square kilometres.
